thread.title: The Chase: Bradley Walsh nearly DISQUALIFIES the Dark Destroyer for breaking the rules

author: hrichardson
title: The Chase: Bradley Walsh nearly DISQUALIFIES the Dark Destroyer for breaking the rules
text:
'you should know better' The Chase: Bradley Walsh nearly DISQUALIFIES the Dark Destroyer for breaking the rules 
Shaun Wallace didn't have a good night, failing to bring it home in the final chase after getting eight questions wrong By HAYLEY RICHARDSON Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments IT was a bad day at the office for Shaun Wallace on The Chase last night, as he nearly got himself disqualified and answered eight questions WRONG in the final chase. 
During a head to head with contestant Danny, who has been compared to EastEnders actor Danny Dyer , the chaser buzzed in before host Bradley Walsh had finished reading the question. ITV Shaun Wallace was a bit too eager with his buzzer 
Bradders was quick to warn the Dark Destroyer he was skating on thin ice. 
He said: ‚ÄúI could disqualify you, you pressed before I‚Äôd asked the question. You know the rules.‚Äù 
Though Shaun, who‚Äôs been on The Chase since 2009, didn‚Äôt reply to the reprimand, he looked pretty sheepish in wake of the gaffe. 
Despite his blunder, he still went on to beat train worker Danny, who crashed out after taking a minus offer of -¬£1,000. The Chase: Bradley Walsh nearly disqualifies Shaun Wallace @TheShaunWallace should've been disqualified even Bradley Marsh said he could so why not? #thechase cheating again 
‚Äî mouthykev (@mouthykev) February 20, 2017 
Though the Dark Destroyer was destroyed in the final chase, which saw the remaining team of two, Miranda and Anne, bag ¬£12,000. 
After he answered a shocking eight questions wrong, the duo managed to get enough push backs to win. 
Naturally the Gang of Chase were not impressed by Shaun's performance. ITV Bradley Walsh warned Shaun he could disqualify him Related Stories TOP GEEZER The Chase's Bradley Walsh breaks down in hysterics at 'Danny Dyer wannabe' dubbed 'best contestant ever' Four gone conclusion Ever wondered what would happen if all four contestants are knocked out on The Chase? This is the answer FUN DIRECTION Bradley Walsh thrashes Zayn Malik with UK's best-selling debut album... and he thinks it's hilarious Worst team ever? The Chase viewers slam team for ‚Äògoing low‚Äô in a ploy to win 'She's pond scum' The Chase contestant slammed for walking away with ¬£12k after taking huge minus offer of ¬£6,000 
One viewer tweeted: "The Dark Destroyer is having a MARE," while one asked: "Why is the Dark Destroyer still being wheeled out on # TheChase ? He's absolutely hopeless." 
Another joked: "It's a good job the Dark Destroyer is funny otherwise he'd have been sacked by now. He loses ITV too much money." It's a good job the dark destroyer is funny otherwise he'd have been sacked by now. He loses itv too much money #TheChase
